Name: Farmocalypse
About the game: Civilization has fallen and the zombie apocalypse has arrived! Build your farm and defend your home and animals against hordes of blood thirsty zombies, evil humans, ghosts, monsters, and demons in Farmpocalypse! Team up with Jack and fight for survival across 8 different world locations. Full version of Farmocalypse will have: - Over 36 weapons to choose from - Over 300 unique enemies to battle - Boss battles - Humorous story with a voxel style world - Vehicles - Over 10 hours of gameplay in campaign mode *The game is still in Eearly Access, so bugs are still present. Not all levels are currently accessible.
